text: Flemish roads and traffic agency
basically it's building and maintaining
roads in the Flemish parts of Belgium my
role is being responsible for keeping
the IT running at the agency the before
moving into the cloud our IT operations
of RIT was totally outsourced to one big
outsourcing party and we decided to move
it to clouds and build our own operation
operation processes around it maybe
really at that moment the most far ahead
of all of them and really provided
everything that we needed to to move to
the cloud our workloads on AWS is
diverse from like from Rome application
like a rote database with all the
details about everything that's up under
and on top of our of our roads until
applications that are used to monitor
the the flow on our roads the the all
the things that happened on our roads
all that kind of things the benefits of
moving to cloud would be in our case
mainly turning our development much more
much more faster allowing to develop
much more faster to the business needs
that arise security stay still stability
cost I also would say working with
everybody has really enabled us to get a
grip on everything that we're running in
production and act very fast in
production on security threats that
arise that's a really great great great
platform that keeps evolving very fast
you can automate every almost everything
there's just no limits with IT on AWS
